titleStmt.title: Cor humiliatum & contritum a sermon preached at S. Pauls Church London, Nov. 29, 1663 / by Richard Lee ... ; wherein was delivered the profession of his judgement against the Solemn league and covenant, the late King's death, &c.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Richard, 1611-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston, J. Williams, T. Garthwait,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A broken and contrite heart.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
